addMarker

public com.google.android.gms.maps.model.Marker addMarker(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                                                          java.lang.String title,
                                                          java.lang.String snippet,
                                                          com.google.android.gms.maps.model.BitmapDescriptor icon)
Used to add a marker to the map

Parameters:
latLng - the LatLng object for the coordinates of the marker to add
title - String displayed on top of the bubble displayed when the marker is clicked
snippet - String displayed as the message in the bubble
icon - BitmapDescriptor the marker icon
Returns:
the new Marker added to the map

Used to trace a polyline on the map

Parameters:

color - the int representing the line color
Returns:
the new Polyline added to the map
